sentences.sContent: Opponents say a unique landscape or seascape is being overshadowed, to the detriment of tourists and residents alike.
sentences.sContent_eng: Opponents say a unique landscape or seascape is being overshadowed, to the detriment of tourists and residents alike.
sentences.sCn: 反对者认为，风能技术会遮挡独特的风景或海景，对当地居民及游客都不公平。

sentences.sContent: The show also includes an exquisite Seurat seascape, some notable Cézannes and considerable painting by Courbet, Gauguin, Van Gogh and others.
sentences.sContent_eng: The show also includes an exquisite Seurat seascape, some notable Cézannes and considerable painting by Courbet, Gauguin, Van Gogh and others.
sentences.sCn: 这次展出的作品，包括一幅修拉的出色海景画，数幅塞尚名画，及库尔贝、高更、梵高等人的不少画作。
